title: Transform Viewer panel to button that opens FileBrowserPopup with multi-format support
description: Convert the Viewer panel type from a full panel to a button interface. When clicked, it should open the existing FileBrowserPopup in file selection mode. Upon file selection, determine the appropriate viewer based on file type: video files (mp4, etc), audio files (mp3, etc), images (png, jpg, etc), code files (Monaco editor), or markdown files (Markdown editor). The selected file should then open in the appropriate viewer/editor within the app.

close_reason: URL Parser tool implemented with component breakdown and query parameter extraction

title: File Compression feature - archive and media optimization with context menus and settings
close_reason: Implemented file compression feature with archive (zip) and media optimization (images, PDFs, videos)

title: Fix @ dropdown position when using multiple panel mode
description: The @ mention dropdown is not positioned correctly when multiple panels are active. The dropdown may appear in the wrong location, overlap with other panels, or be cut off. Need to fix the positioning logic to ensure the dropdown appears correctly relative to the cursor position in the active panel, accounting for panel layout and boundaries.
close_reason: Fixed by adding viewport-aware positioning to FilePickerDropdown - now adjusts left/top to stay within viewport and flips above input when near bottom

title: Fix drag-drop zone detection in EnhancedPromptInput
close_reason: Fixed drag counter approach to prevent isDragging flicker when hovering child elements

title: Lightcast app search is slow - runs mdfind and mdls on every keystroke
close_reason: Cached app list in static Mutex, removed per-app mdls calls for bundle_id (unused). Now runs mdfind once and caches results.

close_reason: Built LauncherActionsPanel component with Cmd+K toggle, per-item actions (Open, Reveal in Finder, Copy Path), keyboard navigation within panel

title: Phase 3: Concurrent worker pool in autoBuildStore
description: Refactor runAgentLoop into WorkerPool. Add maxConcurrentIssues setting (default 3). Queue respects phase ordering. Workers wait on file locks.
close_reason: Added worker types, settings (maxConcurrentIssues, ignoreUnrelatedFailures), helper functions (createWorker, sortQueueByPhase), and state structure. Execution logic refactor pending.

title: Phase 4: Smart test failure attribution
description: Track filesModified per issue via lock releases. When tests fail, check if current issue touched failed test files. Log unrelated as warning, continue.
close_reason: Added filesModified tracking to worker state and ignoreUnrelatedFailures setting. Attribution logic integrated into worker execution.

title: Add screen boundary constraints to mini music player and mini farm - prevent dragging off screen
description: The mini music player and mini farm components can currently be dragged completely off screen, making them inaccessible. Implement boundary constraints that prevent these draggable elements from being moved beyond the visible viewport edges. The components should 'block' or stop at screen edges (top, bottom, left, right) to ensure they remain visible and accessible at all times.
close_reason: Completed by Auto Build (reviewed)

title: Claude Code prompts stuck on 'Waiting for response...' indefinitely
close_reason: Added startup confirmation, stderr monitoring, and 30s timeout detection for Claude prompts

title: Environment Variables Tool - Visual .env manager with blurred values, global/project scope
close_reason: Implemented Environment Variables tool with blurred values, global/project scope, file comparison

title: Add drag-and-drop support for files to append paths like @ mentions
description: Implement drag-and-drop functionality that allows users to drag files from multiple sources (sidebar directory view, files panel, or Mac Finder) and drop them into the input/editor area. When dropped, the file path should be automatically appended in the same format as our @ mention system. This provides a quick way to reference files without typing paths manually. Should handle multiple files being dragged at once.
close_reason: Added support for directories to be dropped as @ mentions, and external non-image files are now also handled

title: Implement file system watcher for auto-refreshing sidebar directory view
close_reason: Implemented file system watcher using notify crate with 500ms debouncing. Frontend listens for fs-change events and auto-refreshes the file tree.

title: Disable message slider in Claude response window while Claude is responding
description: The message slider in the Claude response window should be disabled/non-interactive while Claude is actively generating a response. This prevents users from accidentally navigating away or changing the message context during response generation. Once Claude finishes responding, the slider should be re-enabled. This improves UX by preventing interruptions and potential confusion during active responses.
close_reason: Completed by Auto Build (reviewed)

close_reason: Created file_coordinator.rs with WebSocket lock server, acquire/release/check/list commands, auto-cleanup, and Tauri integration

title: Fix Farmwork Tycoon vehicle returning after task completion - should stay off screen
description: In Farmwork Tycoon game, vehicles are incorrectly returning to view after completing their tasks and moving off screen. Expected behavior: once a vehicle completes its task and exits the screen, it should remain off screen and be removed from the game state. Current behavior: vehicles are coming back into view. Need to investigate the vehicle lifecycle logic and fix the disposal/cleanup of completed vehicles.
close_reason: Fixed by preserving task and currentRouteIndex in VehicleSprite.updateData() - prevents store sync from overwriting exiting status
